name: assessment
description: - My site is live at = nil - It is a REST API system to store the history of spending (expense) of bank customers - The system can store title, amount, note, tags - The system can add new spending history - The system can modify the information of spending - The system can pull out all spending information to show - The system can retrieve spending information as a list - Tools = GO, PostgreSQL, Thunder Client, Postman, Docker, Vue.js, JavaScript, HTML5 </br>
